title: kOpamElarA
sahitya:
kOpamElarA nApai gOpAla shauri


anupallavi

  shrIpati sadA ninnu cintincu cuNTaka


caraNam 1    nAmadi ranjilla nAmamu sEyuju pAmara celiminE bAsiyuNTaga inta 
    caraNam 2    sadayuTa nIvu nA hrdayAra vindamuna vadalakayuNTumani katasinE palkitE
    caraNam 3    samsAra saukhyamu cAlarOsi sadA kamsAri nannu kAvumani vEDitE
    caraNam 4    dAra sutulu prEma pAratOli nI pAdAravindamula dhyAnincu cunTaka
    caraNam 5    shrIsha gOpAladAsa hrdayani vAsuTavani entO varNincu cuNTaka
